Condition, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public class PublishingCondition
extends Object
implements Condition

Wraps a condition to publish the result of its evaluations.

describeDissatisfactionTo

public void describeDissatisfactionTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
Description copied from interface: Condition
Describe this condition's most recent dissatisfaction. This method is meaningful only if the most recent isSatisfied() returned false.

Note: This method should not change the condition's state.
